blockdesc-bettercrate-wood*:
Can hold up to 32 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
blockdesc-bettercrate-copper*:
Can hold up to 64 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
blockdesc-bettercrate-bronze*:
Can hold up to 128 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
blockdesc-bettercrate-iron*:
Can hold up to 256 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
blockdesc-bettercrate-steel*:
Can hold up to 512 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
blockdesc-bettercrate2sided-wood*:
Can hold up to 32 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
blockdesc-bettercrate2sided-copper*:
Can hold up to 64 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
blockdesc-bettercrate2sided-bronze*:
Can hold up to 128 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
blockdesc-bettercrate2sided-iron*:
Can hold up to 256 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
blockdesc-bettercrate2sided-steel*:
Can hold up to 512 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
block-handbooktext-*bettercrate-wood*: Upgrades to Better Crate (Copper) by using a Better Crate Upgrade (Copper). How to use Left mouse click: Take out a single item. Sneak + Left mouse click: Take out a stack of item. Right mouse click: Put in a new or matching stack. Hold Right mouse: Put in all matching stacks from player's inventory. Sprint + Right mouse click + bare hand: Lock/unlock item type.
block-handbooktext-*bettercrate-copper*: Upgraded from Better Crate by using a Better Crate Upgrade (Copper). Upgrades to Better Crate (Bronze) by using a Better Crate Upgrade (Bronze). How to use Left mouse click: Take out a single item. Sneak + Left mouse click: Take out a stack of item. Right mouse click: Put in a new or matching stack. Hold Right mouse: Put in all matching stacks from player's inventory. Sprint + Right mouse click + bare hand: Lock/unlock item type.

Hold Right mouse: Put in all matching stacks from player's inventory. Sprint + Right mouse click + bare hand: Lock/unlock item type.

itemdesc-upgrade-copper: Upgrades a Better Crate to Better Crate (Copper).
item-handbooktext-*upgrade-copper*: Uses Upgrades a Better Crate to Better Crate (Copper). How to use Sneak + Right mouse click on Better Crate.
itemdesc-upgrade-bronze: Upgrades a Better Crate (Copper) to Better Crate (Bronze).
item-handbooktext-*upgrade-bronze*: Uses Upgrades a Better Crate (Copper) to Better Crate (Bronze). How to use Sneak + Right mouse click on Better Crate (Copper).
itemdesc-upgrade-iron: Upgrades a Better Crate (Bronze) to Better Crate (Iron).
item-handbooktext-*upgrade-iron*: Uses Upgrades a Better Crate (Bronze) to Better Crate (Iron). How to use Sneak + Right mouse click on Better Crate (Bronze).
itemdesc-upgrade-steel: Upgrades a Better Crate (Iron) to Better Crate (Steel).
item-handbooktext-*upgrade-steel*: Uses Upgrades a Better Crate (Iron) to Better Crate (Steel). How to use Sneak + Right mouse click on Better Crate (Iron).
item-toohot: Cannot put hot items in this.
item-filledcontainer: Cannot put filled containers in this.
